channel.title: Darkclawz developing team
channel.description:
hello im proud to say that im making a developing team what we need is stuff that i added / was in the game remebr this is 317 not 525 =D
[size=14pt]At the end of each mouth u will be payed depending on how much u have coded or what u have done minimum is ~£5 highest~ £30 to get the £30 u will need 2 code every think i say :D if u a awesome awesome coder u payment will be higher [/size]
Stuff i added -100% working chatoic cbow (fires from distance and gfx works) -korasis spec (little bit glitchy tho) -fixed tormented demon and corp beast attack bug -added new donorzone + staff zone -made new home -when clicking ape atoll tele it shows options to tele now (did nothing before) -added base for either minigame or holiday event (shows interface upon teleing) -edited shops alot + changed npc's around -made dialogue with npc that explains stuff in server and tele's you to hillgiants + dark beasts -fixed glitchy interfaces in quest tab -edited spirites [client sided] -alot more, download to see for your self :D Stuff that was already on server -full summoning -525 graphics -godwars with real maps -warrior guild [fully working] -and other stuff
hello here are some goal's that i would like to make happen 1) zombie minigame ~ im making this one now ;D 2) stable server and eco 3) high scores
these all wont happen by them self and they all wont happen in one so i need people to come and join my developing team because i cant do all me goals by them self
Website Developer.1/2 Server sided coders.1/2 Client sided coders.1/2 Forums Developer.1/2 Update Manager 1/2 coder's 1/2 ~ maybe 3 Hoster 0/1 gfx artist 1/1 beta tester 1/3
Java Experience: real name: Age: Proof(Of Coding Experience): Why Do You Think You Would Be A Good Choice: Msn:If You Have One + add my msn we talk mine is originalpkz@hotmail.co.uk
The team I require: there is more around the home =D im using peekay server but there will be loads of updates this is just me base !
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2q869uf.png[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2aa0z9k.png[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/xd7a4w.png[/img] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/vymyra.png[/img]
[size=14pt] THIS PICTURE IS CHANGE IN CLIENT BECAUSE IM TRYING TO MAKE A MINIGAME IVE CHANGE THE TEST ZONE I WANNA ADD MINI GAME THERE SO YE[/size] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2ijsrh0.png[/img]

item.title: Darkclawz developing team
item.dc:creator: @darkclawz darkclawz
item.description:
@darkclawz wrote:

hello im proud to say that im making a developing team what we need is
stuff that i added / was in the game remebr this is 317 not 525 =D

[size=14pt]At the end of each mouth u will be payed
depending on how much u have coded or what u have done
minimum is ~£5
highest~ £30 to get the £30 u will need 2 code every think i say
if u a awesome awesome coder u payment will be higher [/size]

Stuff i added
-100% working chatoic cbow (fires from distance and gfx works)
-korasis spec (little bit glitchy tho)
-fixed tormented demon and corp beast attack bug
-added new donorzone + staff zone
-made new home
-when clicking ape atoll tele it shows options to tele now (did nothing before)
-added base for either minigame or holiday event (shows interface upon teleing)
-edited shops alot + changed npc’s around
-made dialogue with npc that explains stuff in server and tele’s you to hillgiants + dark beasts
-fixed glitchy interfaces in quest tab
-edited spirites [client sided]
-alot more, download to see for your self
Stuff that was already on server
-full summoning
-525 graphics
-godwars with real maps
-warrior guild [fully working]
-and other stuff

hello here are some goal’s that i would like to make happen

  1. zombie minigame ~ im making this one now ;D
  2. stable server and eco
  3. high scores

these all wont happen by them self and they all wont happen in one so i need people to come and join my developing team because i cant do all me goals by them self

Website Developer.1/2
Server sided coders.1/2
Client sided coders.1/2
Forums Developer.1/2
Update Manager 1/2
coder’s 1/2 ~ maybe 3
